fi.sewsiaica.uusiaika.logic.activegame.conversion

Class Conversion

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.sewsiaica.uusiaika.logic.activegame.conversion.Conversion
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Accusation, Persuasion, Sermon

    public abstract class Conversion
extends Object
    This is an abstract class of the Conversion process, and thus no instances of this type can be made. Currently, its subclasses are Persuasion, Sermon, and Accusation.
    Author:
    iah1016

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Conversion(Random random, Map<String,Integer> intValues, int maxNumberOfConversions, int playerRandomBound, int vilRandomBound)
      The constructor is given random, and Config values as parameters, which it sets as its object variables.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Conversion

        public Conversion(Random random,
                  Map<String,Integer> intValues,
                  int maxNumberOfConversions,
                  int playerRandomBound,
                  int vilRandomBound)
        The constructor is given random, and Config values as parameters, which it sets as its object variables.
        Parameters:
        random - Random is needed for the convSucceeds method.
        intValues - Includes all the variable values of the game.
        maxNumberOfConversions - This value needs to be given separately so that a subclass' setMaxNumberOfConversions functions.
        playerRandomBound - Given separately so that Conversion knows which Random bounds to use.
        vilRandomBound - Given separately so that Conversion knows which Random bounds to use.

    • Method Detail

      • isMaxedOut

        protected boolean isMaxedOut(int val,
                             int max)
        Checking if the value is higher than the maximum.
        Parameters:
        val - The number of times that Villager has gone through this Conversion method. It is currently undecided when this value is reset to its initial value.
        max - The maximum amount of conversions of this type.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the value is at least max or less than zero.

      • convSucceeds

        protected boolean convSucceeds(int pVal,
                               int vVal,
                               int plIncr,
                               int vilIncr)
        The core element of the conversion "battle". The total Player value + random factor versus the total Villager value + random factor.
        Parameters:
        pVal - This is calculated in the subclass.
        vVal - This is calculated in the subclass.
        plIncr - This is given as a parameter playerRandomBound.
        vilIncr - This is given as a parameter vilRandomBound.
        Returns:
        Return value true equals a successful conversion.

      • convert

        public boolean convert(Player player,
                       Villager villager,
                       Sect sect)
        Increases the amount of conversions made to this Villager, calculates "battle values" for Player and Villager, checks who won. If the player is successful, winning actions are made according to the conversion type and then method returns true.
        Parameters:
        player - Head honcho.
        villager - Your opposition.
        sect - This is needed for the winningActions method.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the conversion is successful and false otherwise.

      • getMaxNumberOfConversions

        public int getMaxNumberOfConversions()
        Returns the maxNumberOfConversions.
        Returns:
        The returned value is that of the subclass.

      • setMaxNumberOfConversions

        public abstract void setMaxNumberOfConversions(int maxNumberOfConversions)
        Currently needed for the GameLogicTest tests. The tests will be modified to get the values from Config.intValues.
        Parameters:
        maxNumberOfConversions - The maximum value of the conversion type.

      • checkIfAllowedToProceed

        public abstract boolean checkIfAllowedToProceed(Villager villager)
        The villager's current number of conversions of this type is checked.
        Parameters:
        villager - The target villager.
        Returns:
        If the current value is not max or more, return true.

      • increaseAmountOfConv

        protected abstract void increaseAmountOfConv(Villager villager)
        The number of conversions of this type for this villager is increased by one.
        Parameters:
        villager - The target villager.

      • calculatePlayerAndVilValues

        protected abstract int[] calculatePlayerAndVilValues(Player player,
                                                     Villager villager)
        Calculates The player's and the villager's values for the convSucceeds-method.
        Parameters:
        player - The player.
        villager - The target villager.
        Returns:
        Returns an integer array of the values.

      • winningActions

        protected abstract void winningActions(Player player,
                                       Villager villager,
                                       Sect sect)
        The winning actions for each conversion type differ from each other.
        Parameters:
        player - The player.
        villager - The target villager.
        sect - The sect.
